Description.Text: Broadway by Nashville Vacations is located in Downtown Nashville, is within a 10-minute walk of Nashville Convention and Visitors Bureau, Ryman Auditorium, and Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum. Tennessee State Capitol and Nissan Stadium are also within 1 mi (2 km). This properties apartments provide kitchens with refrigerators, stovetops, microwaves, and dishwashers. Washers/dryers and free wired Internet are standard, as are flat-screen TVs with cable channels. This property offers free self parking.
